This is the CookApp help page - To add a recipe to the favourites list. Click on the recipe you wish to add and click on the star butto$
- To search 1. click on search bar 2. type the name or ingredient you wish to find. 3. (optional) add a boolean operator between words such as and or xor and not.
- Adding a recipe to the recipe list 1. Click on the plus action button at the botton of the screen 2. Add the recipe name 3. Add a Discription 4. Add engridient 5. Tap on save to save your recipe to the recipe list.
- To Edit a recipe 1. Click on the recipe you wish to edit 2. Click on the top right drop down button 3. Click on the edit button 4. Procede editing the recipe.
- To delete a recipe. 1, Click on the recipe you wish to delete 2. Click the delete button
